structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Distribution Of Judicial Decisions And General Laws To Cities And Towns
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 165, Sec. 84 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The state secretary shall furnish to every city and town the reports of the decisions of the supreme judicial court from time to time, as published, and shall furnish to every town hereafter incorporated a full set of said decisions, the index-digest of those decisions, a copy of the General Laws, and copies of all such books and documents in the secretary's office as shall have been previously furnished to towns by the commonwealth; but the clerk of such town shall first file with the secretary a certificate that the town has made suitable provision for the preservation and convenient use of such books and documents.
